Generate a vector of the initial disease states of all individuals in the population

Source: R/variables.R
generate_initial_disease_states.Rd

Generate a vector of the initial disease states of all individuals in the population

Usage

generate_initial_disease_states(parameters_list)

Arguments

parameters_list

A list of model parameters as generated by get_parameters

See also

Other variables: create_variables(), generate_initial_age_classes(), generate_initial_households(), generate_initial_households_bootstrap(), generate_initial_leisure(), generate_initial_schools(), generate_initial_schools_bootstrap(), generate_initial_workplaces()
